column1: Changes which protocol is used when downloading updates and importing builds.
column2: 更改下载更新和导入构筑时使用的协议。

column1: Overrides the default save location for builds.
column2: 覆盖构筑的默认保存位置。

column1: Changes the colour scheme used for the node power display on the passive tree.
column2: 更改天赋树上用于节点强度显示的配色方案。

column1: Overrides the default hex colour for positive values in breakdowns.
column2: 覆盖拆分显示时正值的默认十六进制颜色。

column1: Expected format is 0x000000. The default value is 0x33FF77.
If updating while inside a build, please re-load the build after saving.
column2: 如果在构筑中更新，请在保存后重新加载构筑。

column1: Overrides the default hex colour for negative values in breakdowns.
column2: 覆盖拆分显示时负值的默认十六进制颜色。

column1: Expected format is 0x000000. The default value is 0xDD0022.

column2: 高亮节点十六进制颜色:

column1: Overrides the default hex colour for highlighting nodes in passive tree search.
column2: 覆盖在天赋树上搜索时高亮节点的默认十六进制颜色。

column1: Expected format is 0x000000. The default value is 0xFF0000.
Opt-in to weekly beta test builds:
column2: 选择加入每周Beta测试版本:

column1: Show search circles at viewport edge
column2: 在视窗边缘显示搜索高亮圈

column1: Show build name in window title:
column2: 在窗口标题中显示构筑名称:

column1: Set the default quality that can be overwritten by build-related quality settings in the skill panel.
column2: 设置默认质量，该质量可以被技能面板中构筑相关质量设置覆盖。

column1: Set the default level of your builds. If this is higher than 1, manual level mode will be enabled by default in new builds.
column2: 设置你构筑中角色的默认等级，如果该值高于1，则在新构筑中默认启用手动级别模式。

column1: Show tooltips only for affected slots:
